Do not take the northern route coming from "Bangkulotan Hillside" as there is 2km of hard off road. It is a small path in the forest too difficult for scooters (impossible for cars) because of large stones and mud on the way up.

Osme√±a Peak is a spectacular place to camp - and if you do, you'll get to see the surrounding highlands all the way down to Moalboal and a large stretch of the western coast of Cebu at sunset AND sunrise. ‚Ä¶
